column4: there's a strange issue on my 9.10 Ubuntu 32bit (upgraded from 7.04). The taskbar doesn't always register mouse clicks and it's really annoying. Is there a fix for it=
I have that exact same problem its driving me nuts!
I found this thread http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1351411 but it doesn't give a solution.
I'm using the window selector widget, its a work around
